metadata.Title: CVE-2015-7944 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The RESTful control interface (aka RAPI or ganeti-rapi) in Ganeti before 2.9.7, 2.10.x before 2.10.8, 2.11.x before 2.11.8, 2.12.x before 2.12.6, 2.13.x before 2.13.3, 2.14.x before 2.14.2, and 2.15.x before 2.15.2, when used in SSL mode, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (resource consumption) via SSL parameter renegotiation.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-7944` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganeti - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-haskell-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools - 2.15.2-3
ganeti-htools-2.15 - 2.15.2-3
ganeti2 - 2.15.2-3
python-ganeti-rapi - 2.15.2-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganeti package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.15.2-3').
